metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12662 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Unbound before 1.10.1 has Insufficient Control of Network Message Volume, aka an "NXNSAttack" issue. This is triggered by random subdomains in the NSDNAME in NS records.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Lior Shafir, Yehuda Afek, and Anat Bremler-Barr

criterions.comment: unbound: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
